about_the_game:
The Sock It Soundtrack is here for your listening pleasure!


Composed by the amazing composer Reski, the original soundtrack for Sock It is here for you to listen to!

Featuring tracks from the game's creator Tim Ziti and a guest track from Andriana Mantidfly (Plus variants!), relive the humorous, emotional, and intense moments of Sock It any time you're chilling in your chair, walking to work, or blatantly not paying attention to that thing that you're supposed to be doing and are hoping that nobody notices the earbuds in your ears.

  • 56 tracks!
  • MP3 and FLAC formats! (For the FLAC format please go into the install options and set the correct branch)
  • Quality music you won't forget!

name: Sock It: The Official Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 195 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 517 MB available space
